settings.title: What is Nomad Internet?
settings.content:
Nomad Internet is America's largest Wireless Internet Service
Provider. We are focused on providing High-Speed wireless Internet to
rural communities all over the country and on-the-road travelers!

settings.title: How does Nomad Internet work?
settings.content:
Instead of using traditional Internet wires, we do it by
transmitting wireless Internet access directly to your home, business,
and even while traveling! We combine the latest technology with
Verizon’s service to provide high-speed internet to rural locations and
traveling nomads. We offer a variety
of internet plans, allowing you to choose one that fits your needs.

settings.title: Do I need to sign a contract to use Nomad Internet?
settings.content: No contract with Nomad Internet. You get to choose the subscription plan that’s best for you.

settings.title: Is Nomad Internet secure?
settings.content:
Yes, all Nomad Internet modems let you use public IPs.
Multiple layers of encryption, enhanced Wi-Fi security, firewall
filtering, built-in VPN support, IT admin controls, and other features
deliver strong security at every level.

settings.title: Can I use Nomad Internet for gaming?
settings.content:
Yes. Even if you are in the most remote location, we will
provide you with robust and reliable internet for all your gaming needs.
No matter your plan, you can expect fast internet with low ping rates
and latency.

settings.title: Can I use Nomad Internet for RVing?
settings.content:
Nomad Internet users can take the same high-speed,
low-latency service they have at home to any location Nomad Internet has
coverage. Nomad Internet for RVers/travelers will allow users to pause
and un-pause service based on their individual travel needs.

settings.title: Answers to the most frequently asked questions

settings.name: Robert Green
settings.text: Having been in a rural area, wi-fi internet service providers can be hard to come by. But ever since I discovered Nomad Internet, I have had a reliable and secure connection that has allowed me to get my work done efficiently. From streaming videos smoothly to receiving and sending emails quickly, the wi-fi internet service provider has been the best choice and has given me peace of mind. Thanks to Nomad, I no longer worry about an unreliable connection and am satisfied with the internet service they provide.

settings.name: Alan Rivenbark
settings.text: This plan is Must Have. We watch Netflix, video chat, and the kids play online games. Everything works.

settings.name: Marissa Warren
settings.text: As a wireless internet service provider in rural areas, Nomad Internet has been a lifesaver for me. With their ultra-fast wireless network, I am able to stay connected wherever I am. They consistently provide reliable and secure connections making my remote work and my kid's online education easy and convenient. Overall I have been very impressed with the service I have received from Nomad Internet and highly recommend them for anyone looking for wireless internet services in rural areas.

settings.name: Andrea Calhoun
settings.text: As a broadband provider, Nomad Internet is reliable, secure and it provides a stable connection no matter where you live or travel! I live in a rural community and Nomad has been the perfect solution to keep me connected when I need it most. A few months ago, I switched to their service and I'm so glad I did. Now, my broadband connection is reliable and secure - exactly what I need to stay connected.
